Name: Coffee & Vanilla Daiquiri
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
22.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Coffee, vanilla, sweetness and sourness all in harmony.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Coffee & Vanilla Daiquiri contains 248 calories
